meta.content: Jeopardy Archive William Bernhardt Kate Kwiatkowski Jason Idalski Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6684.

td.p: William Bernhardt, a novelist from Midwest City, Oklahoma
Kate Kwiatkowski, a psychiatrist from Champaign, Illinois
Jason Idalski, a web producer from Ypsilanti, Michigan (whose 2-day cash winnings total $35,998)

tr.td: MY NEXT MUSTACHE
POP CULTURE
BUILT TO DESTROY
"PIN"-TEREST
THE MAMAS
THE PAMPAS
